item.title: LM FUNDING AMERICA INC S-1
item.description: LM FUNDING AMERICA INC, which is in the Finance Services [6199] industry, SEC S-1 filing on September 09, 2021 had 10787 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: common - 269 instances stock - 230 instances offering - 173 instances securities - 160 instances shares - 126 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
